title: JPMorgan Raises $6 Billion in Its First Bond Sale of Year
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. sold $6 billion of investment-grade bonds, kicking off issuance by major Wall Street banks after releasing fourth-quarter results.
content: JPMorgan Chase & Co. sold $6 billion of investment-grade bonds, kicking off issuance by major Wall Street banks after releasing fourth-quarter results.
